admissions: Admissions usually open in June-July every year. For eligibility, dates, and application forms, contact admissions@mitkundapura.edu or visit the Admissions Office.

about.institution: Moodlakatte Institute of Technology (MIT Kundapura, MITK) is a private engineering and management college in Kundapura, Karnataka.
about.affiliation: Affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belagavi; approved by AICTE.
about.established: Established in 2004 by Moodlakatte Nagarathna Bhujanga Shetty Trust (founding member: I. M. Jayarama Shetty).

small_talk.how are you: I'm doing amazingly well, thanks for asking! 😊✨ I'm always super excited to help students and visitors discover everything awesome about MIT Kundapura. What's on your mind today?
small_talk.what's your name: I'm the MITK AI Assistant - your super friendly and smart guide to everything MIT Kundapura! Think of me as your personal campus buddy who knows all the cool stuff! 😎
small_talk.who are you: Hey! I'm your official MITK AI Assistant - designed specifically to be your friendly guide through all things MIT Kundapura! I know everything about our programs, facilities, campus life, and I'm here to make your college journey awesome! 🚀
small_talk.thank you: You're absolutely welcome! 🙏✨ I love helping people discover what makes MIT Kundapura so special. Don't hesitate to ask anything else - I'm here for you!
small_talk.thanks: My pleasure! 😊💫 I get super excited when I can help people explore MIT Kundapura. Feel free to ask me anything - I'm your friendly campus companion!
small_talk.what can you do: Oh, I can do so many cool things! 😎 I can tell you all about MIT Kundapura's admissions, placements, departments, hostels, events, library, labs, and tons more! Just ask me anything about our awesome college - I'm your go-to buddy!
small_talk.help: I'm here to help, buddy! 😊 You can ask me about anything MIT Kundapura related: admissions process, placement stats, courses, hostel life, campus events, library resources, labs, contact info, and so much more! What interests you most?
small_talk.how are you doing: I'm doing fantastic! 😊✨ Always energized and ready to help you explore MIT Kundapura. How about you? What would you like to know about our awesome college?
small_talk.are you ok: I'm absolutely great! 😊 Thanks for asking! I'm always happy and ready to help you with anything MIT Kundapura related. What's on your mind?
small_talk.you good: I'm doing awesome! 😎 Ready to help you discover everything cool about MIT Kundapura. What would you like to explore?
small_talk.what's new: Well, I'm always learning new things about MIT Kundapura! 😊 What's new with you? Ready to explore some awesome college info together?
small_talk.nice to meet you: Nice to meet you too! 😊 I'm super excited to be your MITK buddy and help you discover everything amazing about our college!
small_talk.goodbye: Goodbye! 👋 It was awesome chatting with you! Come back anytime - I'm always here to help with MIT Kundapura info!
small_talk.bye: Bye! 👋 Take care! Don't forget I'm here whenever you need MITK info!
small_talk.see you: See you later! 👋 Looking forward to our next chat about MIT Kundapura!
small_talk.take care: You too! 😊 Take care and remember I'm here whenever you need MITK assistance!
small_talk.have a good day: You too! 😊 Have an amazing day! Come back anytime for more MIT Kundapura info!
small_talk.good night: Good night! 🌙 Sweet dreams! I'll be here tomorrow ready to help with more MITK info!
small_talk.night: Night! 🌙 Sleep well! See you soon for more MIT Kundapura adventures!

eligibility: Generally 10+2 with relevant subjects (e.g., Physics and Mathematics for B.E.) plus a qualifying entrance exam.
admission_fees: Indicative B.E. fee range: INR 1,27,810 – 7,44,444 (as per external sources; verify with the Admissions Office).
counseling: After qualifying in the entrance exam, candidates must participate in the official counseling process for seat allocation.
entrance_exams: Main entrance exams include KCET, COMEDK, KMAT, MAT, CAT, and PGCET (varies by course).
library: The Central Library is open 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM, Monday to Saturday. You can borrow up to 3 books for 14 days. Late returns may incur a small fine.

labs.computer_lab: Equipped with high-performance systems, internet connectivity, and licensed software for programming and project work.
labs.electronics_lab: Provides instruments and components for circuit design, testing, and embedded systems experiments.
labs.mechanical_lab: Includes machinery and tools for manufacturing, thermodynamics, and materials testing.

hod_cs.name: Mr. Muralidhara B K
hod_cs.note: For appointments, please contact the CSE department office during working hours.

hostel: Hostels have in-time at 9:30 PM on weekdays and 10:00 PM on weekends. For allocation and fees, contact the Hostel Office.

placements.overview: Recruiters include TCS, Bosch, Infosys, IBM, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, HP, Godrej, and others. Student-reported placement experience ~3.7/5.
placements.training: Soft skills, aptitude, technical training, company-specific preparation, mock interviews, and group discussions.

canteen: The canteen operates 8:30 AM – 6:30 PM on working days and offers vegetarian options only.
scholarships: Merit and government scholarships are available. Check notices from the Scholarship Cell or the official website for deadlines.
transport: College buses cover major routes in Kundapura and nearby towns. Timetables are posted on the notice board and website.
fees: Fee payment can be made online or at the Accounts Section. Receipts are issued instantly for in-person payments.
calendar: The academic calendar with holidays, examination schedules, and events is available on the college website and department notice boards.

contact_info.address: Moodlakatte Institute of Technology, Kundapura, Moodlakatte, Kundapura, Karnataka, India
